args.description: Kill the HTTP server on port 3456

commands.command: docker rm -f mcp-gateway 2>/dev/null; docker run -d --name mcp-gateway --restart unless-stopped -v /Users/eatatjoes/Desktop/Dev/MCP/gateway:/app -v /Users/eatatjoes/Desktop/Dev:/workspace -w /app -p 3456:3456 -p 8080:8080 node:20-slim sh -c 'node dist/index.js'

args.description: Remove failed container and start fresh

commands.command: docker ps | grep mcp-gateway && echo '---LOGS---' && docker logs mcp-gateway 2>&1 | tail -10

commands.command: docker stop mcp-gateway && docker rm mcp-gateway

docker run -d --name mcp-gateway --restart unless-stopped -v /Users/eatatjoes/Desktop/Dev/MCP/gateway:/app -v /Users/eatatjoes/Desktop/Dev:/workspace -w /app -p 3456:3456 -p 8080:8080 node:20-slim sh -c 'node dist/http-server.js'

args.description: Run HTTP server in Docker container

commands.command: docker ps | grep mcp-gateway && curl -s http://localhost:3456/health | python3 -m json.tool
